Package char_counter

Problem Statement

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CharCounter
    The main class.
    ReadWrite
    ReadWrite class contains functions that can read from and write to the provided filename.

Package char_counter Description

Problem Statement

Using TextFile and a Map(Character,Integer), create a program that takes the file name as a command line argument and counts the occurrence of all the different characters. Save the results in a text file.
